titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1335) making emergency supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1993, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-34, by Mr. Derrick.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 1335 with 1 hour of general debate. The first reading of the bill will be dispensed with. Points of order against consideration of the bill for failure to comply with clause 2(l)(6) of rule XI or clause 7 of rule XXI are waived. Following general debate, the Committee of the Whole shall rise without motion and no further consideration of the bill shall be in order except pursuant to a subsequent order of the House.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 17.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 3/16/1993--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1335 (emergency supplemental appropriations).
